Key: (It really is no good...!)
(I'm no longer able to fully control it alone...)
(But, why is this? Why won't it work...?)
(Is it not enough to mimic the Spirits...?)
(Was I wrong yet again?)
(The results I'm looking for...)
(Then, what I must do next is―)
Shido, wake up... It's morning already.
...Mm... Rinne?
Good morning, Shido.
O-Oh, morning Rinne... What was that just...?

What was what? I'm not dancing the samba
or anything... Are you still half-asleep?

Oh, no... I didn't mean like that...
Lately, I keep having this weird dream...

I see... Well for now, hurry up, change, and wash
your face. I'll make breakfast and wait for you
downstairs.
R-Right...
...Huh? Just me? Where's everyone else?

It seems like today everyone has something to do,
so they've already left.
Huh? I-I see...

(Everyone together... Could it be an examination
on the Fraxinus or something?)
Here you go, I reheated the miso soup.
Thanks... I'll go ahead and eat.
Yes, help yourself.

(Everyone's gone out on some business
or another... I wonder what for?)

(Could Tohka and the others have lost control and
been taken to the Fraxinus? I hope nothing like
that has happened...)
We're leaving now, bye.
Good-bye...!

...Er, I guess there's no point in saying that if
no one's home.

Hmm... Well, no one was here to hear that anyway.
With this sort of thing, staying in the habit of
saying it is what's important.
Really?
Really.
Hey, Shido?
Hm, what's up?
Are you free after school today?
Huh? Er, yeah.
Then, can I make a reservation today, too?
Yeah, of course.
Really? You won't get in trouble?

I've got no reason to refuse.
Also, who'd I get in trouble with?
Tohka-chan, or Kotori-chan?
Oh, er... I'll explain it somehow.
That's good then. Actually... I was kinda worried.
About what?

You know, yesterday's date... I ruined it because
I collapsed and all...

Y-You don't have to worry about anything like
that! It can't be helped. Your health is
undoubtedly more important.

Hehe... I guess I worried you again, Shido.
I hope today's date will be more fun than
yesterday's.

Y-Yeah. But don't push yourself too much,
all right? You just admitted that you collapsed
yesterday.
Yeah, I know. You're such a worrywart, Shido.
It's fine. If you're in pain, then I'm in pain.
Oh... Um...

Oh, uh... Well I meant, in a childhood
friend kind of way...

Y-Yeah. I know. Don't worry about me taking it the
wrong way.
(Whew... It's finally over...)

(Maybe it's because of the test, but it feels like
everyone's a little on edge.)

(But I feel like that's not the case for some...
Oh, speak of the devil. This seems like it'll be
a pain, so I'm gonna find a place to hide.)

Huh, Itsuka? Where'd you go?
I feel like I saw you here just now...

Tch, that jerk. Is he on a date with another
cutie?! Some fiancé he is, that cheating bastard!

(―While I want to ask who the hell would be his
fiancé, it'd be more of a pain if he found me
here.)

Ahh... Mighty gods! Why is it only he who walks
in paradise each day? I beg of you, spare some
love for your humble servant! *sniffle, sniffle*
DAMN ITTTTTTTTT!
There he goes...
Shido, what are you doing?

Whoa! Oh, it's just you, Rinne...
Don't scare me like that.
Were you hiding?

Y-Yeah... Once I get caught by that idiot
Tonomachi, it's all over for the rest of the day.

That's rude to say, Shido...
But I guess you're right.

Right? So, what do you want to do today?
Is there somewhere you want to go?
Where would you like to go, Shido?
Huh? Let's see... I didn't have any major plans...
I'll leave it to you, Shido.
Roger that. Then, let's go.
Okay!

(She left it to me, so I asked if we could change
into regular clothes. Yeah... This way feels
much more like a date.)

Now then, I'm getting a little hungry. Do you want
to get something to eat, Rinne?
Umm... What are you thinking of eating, Shido?

Hmm, lemme see... Maybe kinako bread?
I'm craving the exact amount of sweetness in
kinako powder. Tohka really likes it, too.
Tohka-chan, huh...?
Hmm? Did you say something?
Nothing. I'd like that, too.

There are lots of other stores. Are you sure
you're okay with it?
It's fine! Come on, let's go!
A-All right.
Welcome!
Ah, two kinako breads, please.
I'm sorry. We're all sold out today...
Oh, I see...

How about our new addition to the menu, the
whipped cream bread?
It's freshly baked. I highly recommend it.

Oh, it does smell pretty good. What do you
think, Rinne?

If you want to eat it, then
I think I want to as well.
All right, then two of those, please.
Yes, thank you very much.
Sorry the kinako bread was sold out.

It's all right, but this looks
good too, doesn't it?
Should we try it now?
It's freshly baked, so it's probably tasty.
I'll try it. *munch*...!
Me too. *munch*!

It's delicious! There's just the right amount of
sweetness in the whipped cream, and the dough's
freshly baked, too! This is so good.
Mm, it really is delicious. I'm glad, Shido.
Yeah!

(Huh? I... feel like I've eaten bread with someone
else before, too...)
What's wrong, Shido?
N-No, it's nothing. I'm glad it was a good one.

Yeah. Let's come back another time
to eat kinako bread.
Yeah...
Now then, where to next?
Hmmm, is there anything you want to do, Shido?

Let's see... If you're okay with the very normal,
I guess the arcade would work...
Then, let's head out to the arcade!
Y-Yeah. Let's go!
Yeah!

(After being out in the hot sun for so long,
the crisp chill from the air-conditioning felt
nice against our skin.)
Whew, it's cool in here.
It is. Arcades are perfect for summer vacation.

You're right. It'd be nice to cool down once in
a while, too.

Playing games can make you
heat up quite a bit, though.
Huh, really?

Huh? Have you never been to
an arcade before, Rinne?
Ah, yeah... It's actually my first time.
I see... I guess that's not super surprising.

(Hm? Now that I think of it, I feel like I took
someone else to the arcade for the first time
recently...)
Shido, what's wrong?

N-No, it's nothing. More importantly, is there
a game you'd like to play, Rinne?

Hmm... It's my first time, so I don't know much
about the games that are here. Which one do
you usually play, Shido?

Hmm, me? I usually go for the crane games.
If I'm alone, I play fighting games too.

Huh, so you try to get the plushie
from inside that box?
Right. Do you want to try?
Huh? I'm okay. I'll watch you try, Shido.

Er, but, it's your first time at an arcade and
all. You should try playing something. It's okay
to mess up.

Don't worry, I'm fine. Do you see something there
that you like, Shido?
Uh... W-Well... hm, maybe that?

That one, huh? It is pretty cute. I'll be cheering
you on!
R-Right...

(Actually, there's nothing that really catches my
eye, but I tried to pick something that the girls
at home might like.)
I hope you can get it!
Yeah. I'll give it a try!
Th-That was close! Try again, try again!
Then, one more time...
Do your best, Shido!
Y-Yeah!

(All right, I'll put my all into this. If I can
win, I'll give it as a present to Rinne...)
Agh!
Th-That's too bad...

That's probably enough for today...
Let's head out.
...Sh-Shido, is it really okay?
It's fine, don't worry.
...Sorry, Rinne.
Huh? Why are you apologizing, Shido?

Well, that plushie just now, I was thinking about
giving it to you. But it didn't go as I'd hoped...
Oh, that? I'm fine, don't worry.
Yeah. Thanks, Rinne.
Yeah. Then, where should we go next?

Let's see. We had a snack, we cooled down at
the arcade, so now...
Now...?

Hmmm... Is there any place you'd like to go,
Rinne?

Well, could you take me to a favorite spot of
yours, Shido?
Ah... Well, I guess I do have a place like that.
All right, then. Let's go there.
Right... Let's go.
Yeah!
...We're here, Rinne.
I see, so this is Takadai Park.
See, the view's really nice from over there.
Hehe... Could I take a look?

Haha, you don't have to ask me.
But don't lean out too far. It's dangerous.
Yeah, I'll be careful.

It really is a nice view. I feel like I'm
close to the city...

You can see all of Tengu City from this point.
I really like being up here.

Yeah, and the air is cooler than down in the city,
so it feels really nice.
Hey, Rinne?
Hm? What is it?
Today's... the first time you said it.
What are you talking about...?
You know, telling me what you wanted to do...

Oh... W-Was it bad that I did?
Maybe I was being selfish...
No, it's not that. It's the opposite.
...Huh?

I... I want to have more fun with you, Rinne.
Where we create the day together...
I think a date like that would be nice.

If we just keep doing what I want, I don't think
that it's okay...
...Why isn't it okay?
Huh?
Why isn't it okay to do what you like, Shido...?
No, I mean I want to do what you―

What's fun for you is fun for me, you know?
I'm happy enough to go along with what
you want to do.
Really?

Of course. Of course it's true!
Why would you even question it? You understand,
right? We're childhood friends, after all.
No! O-Of course I know... S-Sorry...
Sh-Should we... go home for today...?
...Yeah.
(Ahh, why does it always end up like this...?)

(But... I really feel like I can't have fun if
it's not the kind of date where Rinne
and I are both having fun...)

(Besides... It feels like Rinne's actually pushing
herself to go along with everything. It just
feels that way...)

(I wonder why Rinne got so upset...? She did
collapse yesterday, so maybe she's still not
well, and I pushed her...)
(*Sigh...* Today's date was a failure...)
(It was like eating sand.)

(Even though Rinne's food is so delicious, today
I felt so on edge, I couldn't really taste it...)
Y-Yes?
Shido...
R-Rinne?!
Hey, do you have a little time right now?
What's wrong?
W-Well... I'm sorry. About today, and yesterday...
Huh...?
I don't know anything about dates with guys, so...

N-No... I don't think it's something you have to
apologize for, you know?
R-Really?

Yeah... Dates are something you have with two
people, so... if it didn't go well, it's partly my
fault, too.

Hey, Shido? Would you, um... like to go on a date
tomorrow, too? I want to redeem myself.
Yeah, of course I'll go with you.
Good... Thank you.
Then, I'll see you tomorrow. Good night, Shido.
Y-Yeah. Good night.
(Whew... That surprised me...)

(But I'm glad that Rinne still felt like going on
a date with me again.)
―Whoa!
I'm coming in.
O-Oh, you were here too.
What do you mean by "too"?

N-Nothing, just talking to myself.
Anyway, what's wrong?
I thought I'd just pass word along to you, Shido.

There was something strange that turned up during
today's analysis.
Something strange?

The spiritual wave we're following became
instantly unstable during a specific time frame.
The distortion patterns were almost the same.
...And what specific time frame was that?
About 4 in the afternoon.
I see...

Right now, I'm having Reine conduct an analysis in
detail, with that spiritual wave pattern's data
as the focus... But it's strange.
Strange...?

It's similar to a Spirit's mental graph
during a date.
Huh?!
And that of a failed date, too.

Isn't it weird? While I was analyzing it, I felt
almost like I was monitoring a Spirit's date.
Maybe it's just a coincidence?

Don't put me in the same boat as someone else
I know. I'm not that stupid.
Wh-Who do you mean, someone else...
You should ask your own heart that question.
(Oof...! She's totally talking about me!)

Listen. The Fraxinus saves data every time
you fail a date with a Spirit.

When I analyzed both the data from your failed
dates, and the spiritual wave patterns from
yesterday and today... Bingo.
Y-Yesterday and today... failed dates...?
What? Do you have some kind of clue?
N-No, it's nothing. Nothing...

Well, whatever... We'll continue to analyze this.
So―
―I just need to keep doing my job, right?

Right, the world keeps spinning as long as you
understand. All right, I'm going to sleep now.
Good night.
Yeah, good night...
(Yesterday and today... I was dating Rinne.)

(And to be honest, it's hard to say that those
dates were successes. In fact, we always have
some sort of trouble, and―)
(They were both failures.)

(Kotori said it was the same as the data from when
I fail at a date. Doesn't that mean that I'm
involved somehow? Meaning―)

Hahaha! No... There's no way...
That's not possible.

(I can't stop laughing at such an outlandish idea.
It's completely ridiculous, isn't it?)
(That my childhood friend is a Spirit...)

(We've been friends for so long. No one would know
more than me that something like that is impossible.)

(Jeez, I'm kinda pathetic for considering
it. My thoughts will just go around in circles if
I keep thinking about this... I should sleep.)
